programme.title: Satamoto Fel Eshreen
Umrzesz w wieku 20 lat
You Will Die at 20
programme.desc: Satamoto Fel Eshreen: Directed by Amjad Abu Alala. With Mustafa Shehata, Islam Mubarak, Mahmoud Maysara Elsaraj, Bonna Khalid. Shortly after Muzamil was born, the village's holy man predicts that he will die at age 20. Muzamil's father can't stand the curse and leaves home. Sakina raises her son as a single mother, overly protective. One day, Muzamil turns 19." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9686154/","name":"You Will Die at 20","alternateName":"Satamoto Fel Eshreen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI3YjE1MWQtZmQwNi00MTkxLWE2ZjMtZDM3OGY2OTNmYjM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjgzMjQ0MTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shortly after Muzamil was born, the village's holy man predicts that he will die at age 20. Muzamil's father can't stand the curse and leaves home. Sakina raises her son as a single mother, overly protective. One day, Muzamil turns 1","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9686154/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nairtejas"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"MAMI MFF Review: You Will Die at 20 (6 Stars)","reviewBody":"Death influences life in You Will Die at 20, only the eighth film in the history of Sudanese cinema. As mind-boggling as that trivia sounds, the social drama highlights the existence of superstition and blind faith in the roots of civilization in the African country of Sudan where a child born just a few days ago is thought to be cursed by a messenger of God and who prophecies that he will die the day he turns 20. The mother of the child, with her striking droopy eyes and without support from her timid husband, takes on the job of caring for her son and counting the days up to his death which she is hugely concerned about and also still very sure about. The coming-of-age container of the film then takes you through the struggle of this young boy who is outcast as the superstition lets people germinate the idea of his death into the idea of a cursed birth. The boy lives as if death is waiting for him, even wondering if his death will be by drowning and if the time he spent in his mother's womb will be counted. It's so powerful in its delivery that you gape at certain sequences, whether it is when her mother goes and scribbles on a wall at the end of a week that her son has lived a week more (because she does not have a calendar) or the time when his friends ask him to die sooner because he is going to die anyway or when the people around him think memorizing the holy book is better than learning mathematics. Bit slow in parts but always magnificent, You Will Die at 20 is a film that must be watched because Sudan has stories to tell and it needs people to hear and watch them. The main score by Amin Bouhafa is heartbreaking. TN.\n\n(Watched and reviewed at its India premiere at the 21st MAMI Mumbai Film Festival.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2015,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-12","keywords":"africa,north africa,sudan,arabic,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OVS]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1329381657","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmI4NmYyNmYtNDNjMi00MmUyLWEwNDUtOGIzNTYwMTg3MWZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmI4NmYyNmYtNDNjMi00MmUyLWEwNDUtOGIzNTYwMTg3MWZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10438512/","name":"Mustafa Shehata"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10438515/","name":"Islam Mubarak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12665628/","name":"Mahmoud Maysara Elsaraj"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5617646/","name":"Amjad Abu Alala"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249644/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665153/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0386116/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5617646/","name":"Amjad Abu Alala"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2691011/","name":"Yousef Ibrahim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12933710/","name":"Hammour Ziada"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Cast Away: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Paul Sanchez, Lari White, Leonid Citer, David Allen Brooks. A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0162222/","name":"Cast Away","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y5ZTU4YjctMDRmMC00MTg4LWE1M2MtMjk4MzVmOTE4YjkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc1NTQxODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0162222/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jspratjr3"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding","reviewBody":"I think this is an excellent movie..I've noticed many felt it "too long, boring, etc..." which is to be expected in today's "gimme non-stop action; I haven't been doing anything for 5 minutes, I'm bored" mentality. This was a true man vs nature movie that really made me think about what I take for granted and I found myself wondering how I would react in such a situation. Would I talk to a volleyball? you betcha...anyone who has spent any significant time alone can relate. Bought the DVD and will watch it for years too come.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":551012,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-02-07","keywords":"survival,crash survivor,remote island,talking to an inanimate object,lost at sea","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi127449625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY3MGY2ODktY2NkOC00NTljLTk0YmMtZWUyYmVlMTVkZWY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hcmNtYW5u._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY3MGY2ODktY2NkOC00NTljLTk0YmMtZWUyYmVlMTVkZWY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hcmNtYW5u._V1_.jpg","description":"The official trailer for 'Cast Away' starring Tom Hanks."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584052/","name":"Paul Sanchez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115310/","name":"William Broyles Jr."}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Every Day
Każdego dnia
Every Day
programme.desc:
Every Day: Directed by Michael Sucsy. With Angourie Rice, Justice Smith, Jeni Ross, Lucas Jade Zumann. A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7026672/","name":"Every Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTFiNzQ2OGUtYTdmMi00NjRjLWExN2MtZmNiODI4MTY3MGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NTM5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7026672/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jefgg"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"My Two Cents","reviewBody":"Here is my two cents about the movie "Every Day". I wish I could still discuss movies, TV shows, actors and actresses on IMDB message boards. Those boards were shut down about a year ago. I don't think I am the target demographic for the movie because I am really old. My movie going is very sporadic. And I usually loath any movie about changing bodies, time travel, coming back from the dead or any rubbish like that. I think the preview caught my attention because it made me think of my friend Jayne (not her real name).

I have lived over 18,000 days. Two of my best days were when Jayne was visiting from about 1,700 miles away. Those were two of the happiest days of my life. The first one was a big surprise because I hadn't seen her in about 20 years and wasn't sure what to expect. Jayne is biracial and bisexual. I think she is biawesome. And "Every Day" is an LGBT related movie and did deal with race a little. I'm not gay. Notthattheresanythingwrongwiththat. Gay kids had a very rough time when I was growing up. I hope it is easier for them now.

It would be awesome if Jayne or someone like her could hang out with me everyday. And it wouldn't bother me if she did it in different bodies. The movie made me think of having a great time with new friends back in the day. If Jayne was in a different body maybe she could sign to let me know it is her. Both of us are hearing people and fluent in American Sign Language.

I don't go to the movies often so the only actor or actress I recognized was Maria Bello. Sometimes it is beneficial to watch a movie featuring actors you are unfamiliar with because you have no expectations. It was interesting to see Justice Smith as A then as Justin.

I started thinking about changing bodies. I would not want anyone else in my body. And I would not want to be in someone else's body ... except for maybe Mariah Carey. I am left handed. How would that work? If someone was in my body they would assume my voice. But what about my accent? What about speaking different languages? What about playing musical instruments, playing sports, etc.? What if the host body got sick, injured or died? What if A got the host body or someone else pregnant? What if A turned bad and broke the law? I guess A only occupied bodies that were the same age so that may have decreased the chance of an issue with the age of consent.

I read a review that described Justin as "neglectful". That was a horrible choice of words. Inattentive is probably more accurate. And maybe he was a little immature. Some young women get tired of immature boyfriends and seek older guys. I would not recommend that. It is a good way to find a pervert like R. Kelly.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20137,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-02-23","keywords":"singing in a car,mother daughter relationship,father daughter relationship,sister sister relationship,boyfriend girlfriend conflict","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1251457049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI5ZmQwZGItZmEwYy00ZThiLWJjOTgtM2MyZWM1NjEzMTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI5ZmQwZGItZmEwYy00ZThiLWJjOTgtM2MyZWM1NjEzMTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"16-year-old Rhiannon falls in love with a mysterious spirit named "A" who inhabits a different body every day. Feeling an unmatched connection, Rhiannon and A work each day to find each other, not knowing what or who the next day will bring. The more the two fall in love, the more the realities of loving someone who is a different person every 24 hours takes a toll, leaving Rhiannon and "A" to face the hardest decision either has ever had to make."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3886028/","name":"Angourie Rice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6819854/","name":"Justice Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2913275/","name":"Debby Ryan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302591/","name":"Michael Sucsy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0190175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0470082/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296441/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5428959/","name":"Jesse Andrews"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2832819/","name":"David Levithan"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Umrzesz w wieku 20 lat
You Will Die at 20
programme.desc: Muzamil rodzi się w Sudanie. Zostaje mu przewidziana śmierć w wieku 20 lat. Z biegiem czasu zaczyna sobie uzmysławiać, co to oznacza. Życie upływa mu w poczuciu rychłego końca. Odrobinę pociechy przynosi mu obecność przyjaciółki Naimy i obieżyświata Sulaimana. Dzięki niemu Muzamil zapoznaje się z kinematografią.

programme.title: No Fathers in Kashmir
Nie ma ojców w Kaszmirze
No Fathers In Kashmir
programme.desc:
No Fathers in Kashmir: Directed by Ashvin Kumar. With Anshuman Jha, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Soni Razdan, Maya Sarao. A teenage British Kashmiri, Noor, retraces her roots. She is joined by Majid, a local Kashmiri boy who is more smitten by her exotic foreignness than her obsession to unravel the mysteries of their disappeared fathers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5279674/","name":"No Fathers in Kashmir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY0NWJjNmEtYmM2ZC00NGE1LTk0OGEtMThjNDE1MzdiNjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUxMTY3ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage British Kashmiri, Noor, retraces her roots. She is joined by Majid, a local Kashmiri boy who is more smitten by her exotic foreignness than her obsession to unravel the mysteries of their disappeared fathers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5279674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tejas_Vinda_AITS"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Loss, love and hopes in the Valley of Tears,, Kashmir.","reviewBody":"A teenage girl from Britain, Noor visits Kashmir with her mother only to stumble upon the real story behind her missing father. She befriends a local Kashmiri boy, Majid who has suffered a similar fate and he agrees to help her unravel more truths. But their pursuit ends up taking a different turn.

The filmmaker brings a brutal and harsh reality of the Kashmir Valley.

Noor (Zara Webb) and Majid (Shivam Raina).

When Noor finds out that both their fathers were 'picked up' (the meaning of which Noor eventually understands) by the Indian army years ago, with no news of them since, she wants to find out more,, about extremely conservative Muslims who dream of an Islamic state and double-agents who pretend to work for militants as well as for the army.

Her probing unravels more than what she bargained for including the double dealings of an idolized, radical local leader, Arshid (Ashvin Kumar).

Thee good moments between Noor and Majid,..which bring a smile to your face.,that eventually develops into a tender love story even though their present realities and circumstances are so different.

The story is heart-wrenching and mostly gripping.

The innocent charm of the lead pair Zara Webb and Shivam Raina that shines through - especially Raina who touches a chord as Majid.

This film is not a light watch - it's a poignant tale that leaves you thinking about the half-widows and half-orphans, and many such untold stories.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":123,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-04-05","keywords":"boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No Fathers in Kashmir !?!?! Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1541258265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0MzNjM2YtOWUwZS00ZjcwLWFkMDktMWExZjM5YmFhZDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0MzNjM2YtOWUwZS00ZjcwLWFkMDktMWExZjM5YmFhZDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official trailer of No Fathers in Kashmir directed by Oscar® nominated and 2 time national award winning Ashvin Kumar. We are now screening nationwide to critical acclaim from audiences and critics alike! 

Fabulous performances...You are transported into that world!' - Alia Bhatt

'Beautifully performed, skillfully made.' - Mira Nair 

'Deeply moving...Ashvin's acting is effective.' - Shabana Azmi

'Rarely have I see a film so brilliantly written, subtly nuanced. Every citizen of India go and watch it!' - Aparna Sen 

'Powerful...heartbreaking.' Kalki Koechlin. 

'No Fathers in Kashmir is a must watch.' - Rediff (4.5 stars)

'Zara Webb and Shivam Raina shine bright in this dark tale of a paradise at war.' - Republic World (4 stars)

'The harsh reality of Kashmir that hits you hard.' - Filmy Curry (4 stars)

'No Fathers In Kashmir must be seen by every Indian. It tells us things we don't want to hear...Tucked away in this despairing cry of muffled anguish is a tender love story which is hard to leave behind.' - Subhash K Jha (4 stars)

'Oscar-nominated Ashvin Kumar has masterfully crafted the movie which has hues of innocence, guilt, humanity, longing, politics and hope.' - Desi Martini (4 stars)

The Cast -
Zara Webb
Shivan Raina
Ashvin Kumar
Kulbhushan Kharbanda
Natasha Mago
Maya Sarao
Soni Razdan
Anshuman Jha

programme.title: Au Crépuscule
O zmierzchu
Sutemose
programme.desc:
Au Crépuscule (Dusk): Directed by Sharunas Bartas. With Arvydas Dapsys, Marius Povilas Elijas Martynenko, Alina Zaliukaite-Ramanauskiene, Salvijus Trepulis. A historical drama set in Lithuania in 1948, "Au Crépuscule" focuses on Ounté, a 19-year old boy who experiences passion and violence after joining a group of partisans resisting the Soviet occupation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9799640/","name":"Au Crépuscule (Dusk)","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTRiMWE2YmYtMjZmMy00NGM0LThhYTktNGZhNzY5NzRlNGNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NzAxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A historical drama set in Lithuania in 1948, "Au Crépuscule" focuses on Ounté, a 19-year old boy who experiences passion and violence after joining a group of partisans resisting the Soviet occupation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9799640/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Giedrius89"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forest Brothers","reviewBody":"Sharunas Bartas is one my favorite directors. In my humble opinion Eastern Drift (2010) is his best work, wich he directed, writen and stared himself. His movies been selected into Cannes festival for as long as I can remember.

At Dusk is a film about post WW2 era when Soviets were occupying Lithuania. (NKVD) were ragging through Lithunian country land. Trying to establish a new rule and dealing with some partisan movement in some areas.

Movie folows Jurgis Pliauga played by Arvydas Dapsys who has very dificult relationship with people arround him. A modest farmstead owner whom we get to know throughout the film & A group of partisans (Forest Brothers) who hides in the forest from NKVD.

Film establishes a very slow pace and some action at the end of the film. Wich a little reminded me of another Barta's movie Peace to Us in Our Dreams. Movie dont really show any heroic action from partisans or the cruelty of Soviet invaders. Instead focuses on Day to Day lives of ordinary people in these harsh times.

Read several reviews on how this film is Russian desinformation against Lithuanian partisans wich dont make any sense really. I dont understand where they get this idea from... Movie dont paint soviets as liberators. Yes movie shows partisans do some killings themselfs against their countrymen who tend to work with the other side (NKVD) I guess that is what gave them this idea of propoganda. Other reviewer called that Lithaunian films have some Lithuanian-ish dramatism in them. Wich is soo true. And theres a lot of that in this film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-29","keywords":"cannes 2020","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1491451929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVlZjU2ZGItZWFmNy00NzE1LTlmNzItZmQxYTY0MjA0ZmM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVlZjU2ZGItZWFmNy00NzE1LTlmNzItZmQxYTY0MjA0ZmM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2056519/","name":"Arvydas Dapsys"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10382563/","name":"Marius Povilas Elijas Martynenko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9326456/","name":"Alina Zaliukaite-Ramanauskiene"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058401/","name":"Sharunas Bartas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057684/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0335022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037782/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058401/","name":"Sharunas Bartas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6856660/","name":"Ausra Giedraityte"}],"duration":"PT2H8M"}</script><metacontent="

At Dusk is a film about post WW2 era when Soviets were occupying Lithuania. (NKVD) were ragging through Lithunian country land. Trying to establish a new rule and dealing with some partisan movement in some areas.

Movie folows Jurgis Pliauga played by Arvydas Dapsys who has very dificult relationship with people arround him. A modest farmstead owner whom we get to know throughout the film & A group of partisans (Forest Brothers) who hides in the forest from NKVD.

Film establishes a very slow pace and some action at the end of the film. Wich a little reminded me of another Barta's movie Peace to Us in Our Dreams. Movie dont really show any heroic action from partisans or the cruelty of Soviet invaders. Instead focuses on Day to Day lives of ordinary people in these harsh times.

Read several reviews on how this film is Russian desinformation against Lithuanian partisans wich dont make any sense really. I dont understand where they get this idea from... Movie dont paint soviets as liberators. Yes movie shows partisans do some killings themselfs against their countrymen who tend to work with the other side (NKVD) I guess that is what gave them this idea of propoganda. Other reviewer called that Lithaunian films have some Lithuanian-ish dramatism in them. Wich is soo true. And theres a lot of that in this film.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-29","keywords":"cannes 2020","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1491451929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVlZjU2ZGItZWFmNy00NzE1LTlmNzItZmQxYTY0MjA0ZmM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVlZjU2ZGItZWFmNy00NzE1LTlmNzItZmQxYTY0MjA0ZmM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2056519/","name":"Arvydas Dapsys","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10382563/","name":"Marius Povilas Elijas Martynenko","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9326456/","name":"Alina Zaliukaite-Ramanauskiene"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058401/","name":"Sharunas Bartas"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057684/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0335022/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037782/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058401/","name":"Sharunas Bartas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6856660/","name":"Ausra Giedraityte"],"duration":"PT2H8M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Fellwechselzeit: Directed by Sabrina Mertens. With Zelda Espenschied, Miriam Schiweck, Freya Kreutzkam, Bernd Wolf. The still life of a family in 57 pictures. Germany in the 1970ies. Stephanie is an intelligent and lively child. But she leads an isolated life with her parents, marked by the symbiotic bonding with her mentally unstable mother. A mother who has never really left her own childhood behind and who lives amidst things of the past and the memories connected to them. Stephanie's relationship with her father is one of mistrust. The passing years only bring aging, but no future. Unspoken thoughts lurk underneath the surface of everyday life. So Stephanie retreats into a dark world of barbaric fantasies, that are nourished by the traces of the past and only belong to her alone. One day, however, Stephanie's secret invades the family's reality." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11758900/","name":"Fellwechselzeit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGFkZGQ2ODctZjViOS00Yjc0LThjZjctZjg1YzliNTRlMDVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODU2NjIzMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"The still life of a family in 57 pictures. programme.desc: Cast Away: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Paul Sanchez, Lari White, Leonid Citer, David Allen Brooks. A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0162222/","name":"Cast Away","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y5ZTU4YjctMDRmMC00MTg4LWE1M2MtMjk4MzVmOTE4YjkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc1NTQxODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0162222/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jspratjr3"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding","reviewBody":"I think this is an excellent movie..I've noticed many felt it "too long, boring, etc..." which is to be expected in today's "gimme non-stop action; I haven't been doing anything for 5 minutes, I'm bored" mentality. This was a true man vs nature movie that really made me think about what I take for granted and I found myself wondering how I would react in such a situation. Would I talk to a volleyball? you betcha...anyone who has spent any significant time alone can relate. Bought the DVD and will watch it for years too come.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":551012,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-02-07","keywords":"survival,crash survivor,remote island,talking to an inanimate object,lost at sea","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi127449625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY3MGY2ODktY2NkOC00NTljLTk0YmMtZWUyYmVlMTVkZWY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hcmNtYW5u._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY3MGY2ODktY2NkOC00NTljLTk0YmMtZWUyYmVlMTVkZWY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hcmNtYW5u._V1_.jpg","description":"The official trailer for 'Cast Away' starring Tom Hanks."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584052/","name":"Paul Sanchez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115310/","name":"William Broyles Jr."}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Every Day
Każdego dnia
Every Day
programme.desc:
Every Day: Directed by Michael Sucsy. With Angourie Rice, Justice Smith, Jeni Ross, Lucas Jade Zumann. A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7026672/","name":"Every Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTFiNzQ2OGUtYTdmMi00NjRjLWExN2MtZmNiODI4MTY3MGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NTM5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7026672/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jefgg"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"My Two Cents","reviewBody":"Here is my two cents about the movie "Every Day". I wish I could still discuss movies, TV shows, actors and actresses on IMDB message boards. Those boards were shut down about a year ago. I don't think I am the target demographic for the movie because I am really old. My movie going is very sporadic. And I usually loath any movie about changing bodies, time travel, coming back from the dead or any rubbish like that. I think the preview caught my attention because it made me think of my friend Jayne (not her real name).

I have lived over 18,000 days. Two of my best days were when Jayne was visiting from about 1,700 miles away. Those were two of the happiest days of my life. The first one was a big surprise because I hadn't seen her in about 20 years and wasn't sure what to expect. Jayne is biracial and bisexual. I think she is biawesome. And "Every Day" is an LGBT related movie and did deal with race a little. I'm not gay. Notthattheresanythingwrongwiththat. Gay kids had a very rough time when I was growing up. I hope it is easier for them now.

It would be awesome if Jayne or someone like her could hang out with me everyday. And it wouldn't bother me if she did it in different bodies. The movie made me think of having a great time with new friends back in the day. If Jayne was in a different body maybe she could sign to let me know it is her. Both of us are hearing people and fluent in American Sign Language.

I don't go to the movies often so the only actor or actress I recognized was Maria Bello. Sometimes it is beneficial to watch a movie featuring actors you are unfamiliar with because you have no expectations. It was interesting to see Justice Smith as A then as Justin.

I started thinking about changing bodies. I would not want anyone else in my body. And I would not want to be in someone else's body ... except for maybe Mariah Carey. I am left handed. How would that work? If someone was in my body they would assume my voice. But what about my accent? What about speaking different languages? What about playing musical instruments, playing sports, etc.? What if the host body got sick, injured or died? What if A got the host body or someone else pregnant? What if A turned bad and broke the law? I guess A only occupied bodies that were the same age so that may have decreased the chance of an issue with the age of consent.

I read a review that described Justin as "neglectful". That was a horrible choice of words. Inattentive is probably more accurate. And maybe he was a little immature. Some young women get tired of immature boyfriends and seek older guys. I would not recommend that. It is a good way to find a pervert like R. IMDb data; ttnr: 7026672, Title: Every Day, --- Description: Every Day: Directed by Michael Sucsy. With Angourie Rice, Justice Smith, Jeni Ross, Lucas Jade Zumann. A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7026672/","name":"Every Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTFiNzQ2OGUtYTdmMi00NjRjLWExN2MtZmNiODI4MTY3MGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NTM5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7026672/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jefgg","dateCreated":"2018-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"My Two Cents","reviewBody":"Here is my two cents about the movie "Every Day". I wish I could still discuss movies, TV shows, actors and actresses on IMDB message boards. Those boards were shut down about a year ago. I don't think I am the target demographic for the movie because I am really old. My movie going is very sporadic. And I usually loath any movie about changing bodies, time travel, coming back from the dead or any rubbish like that. I think the preview caught my attention because it made me think of my friend Jayne (not her real name).

I have lived over 18,000 days. Two of my best days were when Jayne was visiting from about 1,700 miles away. Those were two of the happiest days of my life. The first one was a big surprise because I hadn't seen her in about 20 years and wasn't sure what to expect. Jayne is biracial and bisexual. I think she is biawesome. And "Every Day" is an LGBT related movie and did deal with race a little. I'm not gay. Notthattheresanythingwrongwiththat. Gay kids had a very rough time when I was growing up. I hope it is easier for them now.

It would be awesome if Jayne or someone like her could hang out with me everyday. And it wouldn't bother me if she did it in different bodies. The movie made me think of having a great time with new friends back in the day. If Jayne was in a different body maybe she could sign to let me know it is her. Both of us are hearing people and fluent in American Sign Language.

I don't go to the movies often so the only actor or actress I recognized was Maria Bello. Sometimes it is beneficial to watch a movie featuring actors you are unfamiliar with because you have no expectations. It was interesting to see Justice Smith as A then as Justin.

I started thinking about changing bodies. I would not want anyone else in my body. And I would not want to be in someone else's body ... except for maybe Mariah Carey. I am left handed. How would that work? If someone was in my body they would assume my voice. But what about my accent? What about speaking different languages? What about playing musical instruments, playing sports, etc.? What if the host body got sick, injured or died? What if A got the host body or someone else pregnant? What if A turned bad and broke the law? I guess A only occupied bodies that were the same age so that may have decreased the chance of an issue with the age of consent.

I read a review that described Justin as "neglectful". That was a horrible choice of words. Inattentive is probably more accurate. And maybe he was a little immature. Some young women get tired of immature boyfriends and seek older guys. I would not recommend that. It is a good way to find a pervert like R. Kelly.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20137,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-02-23","keywords":"singing in a car,mother daughter relationship,father daughter relationship,sister sister relationship,boyfriend girlfriend conflict","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1251457049","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI5ZmQwZGItZmEwYy00ZThiLWJjOTgtM2MyZWM1NjEzMTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI5ZmQwZGItZmEwYy00ZThiLWJjOTgtM2MyZWM1NjEzMTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"16-year-old Rhiannon falls in love with a mysterious spirit named "A" who inhabits a different body every day. programme.title: Au Crépuscule
O zmierzchu
Sutemose
programme.desc:
Au Crépuscule (Dusk): Directed by Sharunas Bartas. With Arvydas Dapsys, Marius Povilas Elijas Martynenko, Alina Zaliukaite-Ramanauskiene, Salvijus Trepulis. A historical drama set in Lithuania in 1948, "Au Crépuscule" focuses on Ounté, a 19-year old boy who experiences passion and violence after joining a group of partisans resisting the Soviet occupation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9799640/","name":"Au Crépuscule (Dusk)","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTRiMWE2YmYtMjZmMy00NGM0LThhYTktNGZhNzY5NzRlNGNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NzAxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A historical drama set in Lithuania in 1948, "Au Crépuscule" focuses on Ounté, a 19-year old boy who experiences passion and violence after joining a group of partisans resisting the Soviet occupation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9799640/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Giedrius89"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forest Brothers","reviewBody":"Sharunas Bartas is one my favorite directors. In my humble opinion Eastern Drift (2010) is his best work, wich he directed, writen and stared himself. His movies been selected into Cannes festival for as long as I can remember.

At Dusk is a film about post WW2 era when Soviets were occupying Lithuania. (NKVD) were ragging through Lithunian country land. Trying to establish a new rule and dealing with some partisan movement in some areas.

Movie folows Jurgis Pliauga played by Arvydas Dapsys who has very dificult relationship with people arround him. A modest farmstead owner whom we get to know throughout the film & A group of partisans (Forest Brothers) who hides in the forest from NKVD.

Film establishes a very slow pace and some action at the end of the film. Wich a little reminded me of another Barta's movie Peace to Us in Our Dreams. Movie dont really show any heroic action from partisans or the cruelty of Soviet invaders. Instead focuses on Day to Day lives of ordinary people in these harsh times.

Read several reviews on how this film is Russian desinformation against Lithuanian partisans wich dont make any sense really. I dont understand where they get this idea from... Movie dont paint soviets as liberators. Yes movie shows partisans do some killings themselfs against their countrymen who tend to work with the other side (NKVD) I guess that is what gave them this idea of propoganda. Other reviewer called that Lithaunian films have some Lithuanian-ish dramatism in them. Wich is soo true. And theres a lot of that in this film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-29","keywords":"cannes 2020","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1491451929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVlZjU2ZGItZWFmNy00NzE1LTlmNzItZmQxYTY0MjA0ZmM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVlZjU2ZGItZWFmNy00NzE1LTlmNzItZmQxYTY0MjA0ZmM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2056519/","name":"Arvydas Dapsys"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10382563/","name":"Marius Povilas Elijas Martynenko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9326456/","name":"Alina Zaliukaite-Ramanauskiene"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058401/","name":"Sharunas Bartas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057684/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0335022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037782/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058401/","name":"Sharunas Bartas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6856660/","name":"Ausra Giedraityte"}],"duration":"PT2H8M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: No Fathers in Kashmir
Nie ma ojców w Kaszmirze
No Fathers In Kashmir
programme.desc:
No Fathers in Kashmir: Directed by Ashvin Kumar. With Anshuman Jha, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Soni Razdan, Maya Sarao. A teenage British Kashmiri, Noor, retraces her roots. She is joined by Majid, a local Kashmiri boy who is more smitten by her exotic foreignness than her obsession to unravel the mysteries of their disappeared fathers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5279674/","name":"No Fathers in Kashmir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY0NWJjNmEtYmM2ZC00NGE1LTk0OGEtMThjNDE1MzdiNjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUxMTY3ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage British Kashmiri, Noor, retraces her roots. She is joined by Majid, a local Kashmiri boy who is more smitten by her exotic foreignness than her obsession to unravel the mysteries of their disappeared fathers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5279674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tejas_Vinda_AITS"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Loss, love and hopes in the Valley of Tears,, Kashmir.","reviewBody":"A teenage girl from Britain, Noor visits Kashmir with her mother only to stumble upon the real story behind her missing father. She befriends a local Kashmiri boy, Majid who has suffered a similar fate and he agrees to help her unravel more truths. But their pursuit ends up taking a different turn.

The filmmaker brings a brutal and harsh reality of the Kashmir Valley.

Noor (Zara Webb) and Majid (Shivam Raina).

When Noor finds out that both their fathers were 'picked up' (the meaning of which Noor eventually understands) by the Indian army years ago, with no news of them since, she wants to find out more,, about extremely conservative Muslims who dream of an Islamic state and double-agents who pretend to work for militants as well as for the army.

Her probing unravels more than what she bargained for including the double dealings of an idolized, radical local leader, Arshid (Ashvin Kumar).

Thee good moments between Noor and Majid,..which bring a smile to your face.,that eventually develops into a tender love story even though their present realities and circumstances are so different.

The story is heart-wrenching and mostly gripping.

The innocent charm of the lead pair Zara Webb and Shivam Raina that shines through - especially Raina who touches a chord as Majid.

This film is not a light watch - it's a poignant tale that leaves you thinking about the half-widows and half-orphans, and many such untold stories.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":123,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-04-05","keywords":"boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No Fathers in Kashmir !?!?! Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1541258265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0MzNjM2YtOWUwZS00ZjcwLWFkMDktMWExZjM5YmFhZDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0MzNjM2YtOWUwZS00ZjcwLWFkMDktMWExZjM5YmFhZDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official trailer of No Fathers in Kashmir directed by Oscar® nominated and 2 time national award winning Ashvin Kumar. We are now screening nationwide to critical acclaim from audiences and critics alike! 

Fabulous performances...You are transported into that world!' - Alia Bhatt

'Beautifully performed, skillfully made.' - Mira Nair 

'Deeply moving...Ashvin's acting is effective.' - Shabana Azmi

'Rarely have I see a film so brilliantly written, subtly nuanced. Every citizen of India go and watch it!' - Aparna Sen 

'Powerful...heartbreaking.' Kalki Koechlin. 

'No Fathers in Kashmir is a must watch.' - Rediff (4.5 stars)

'Zara Webb and Shivam Raina shine bright in this dark tale of a paradise at war.' - Republic World (4 stars)

'The harsh reality of Kashmir that hits you hard.' - Filmy Curry (4 stars)

'No Fathers In Kashmir must be seen by every Indian. It tells us things we don't want to hear...Tucked away in this despairing cry of muffled anguish is a tender love story which is hard to leave behind.' - Subhash K Jha (4 stars)

'Oscar-nominated Ashvin Kumar has masterfully crafted the movie which has hues of innocence, guilt, humanity, longing, politics and hope.' - Desi Martini (4 stars)

The Cast -

programme.title: Fellwechselzeit
Pora wylinki
Fellwechselzeit
programme.desc: Fellwechselzeit: Directed by Sabrina Mertens. With Zelda Espenschied, Miriam Schiweck, Freya Kreutzkam, Bernd Wolf. The still life of a family in 57 pictures. Germany in the 1970ies. Stephanie is an intelligent and lively child. But she leads an isolated life with her parents, marked by the symbiotic bonding with her mentally unstable mother. A mother who has never really left her own childhood behind and who lives amidst things of the past and the memories connected to them. Stephanie's relationship with her father is one of mistrust. The passing years only bring aging, but no future. Unspoken thoughts lurk underneath the surface of everyday life. So Stephanie retreats into a dark world of barbaric fantasies, that are nourished by the traces of the past and only belong to her alone. One day, however, Stephanie's secret invades the family's reality." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11758900/","name":"Fellwechselzeit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGFkZGQ2ODctZjViOS00Yjc0LThjZjctZjg1YzliNTRlMDVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODU2NjIzMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"The still life of a family in 57 pictures. Germany in the 1970ies. Stephanie is an intelligent and lively child. But she leads an isolated life with her parents, marked by the symbiotic bonding with her mentally unstable mother. programme.title: Mission: Impossible
Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Mission: Impossible: Directed by Brian De Palma. With Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Béart, Henry Czerny. An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117060/","name":"Mission: Impossible","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NjI2MjU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk3ODYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117060/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rammstein-2"},"dateCreated":"2000-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"I like this film!","reviewBody":"I really liked this one. Not very much in common with the TV-series, and I can see why so many dislike it that way. But there are some REALLY good sequences here, and there is even one that I consider to be one of the very best and most suspenseful parts of any movie - the part where Cruise is in the vault. Beautiful and nerve-racking.\n\nNot much else to say, though - it's an action movie, and it's a good one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":402938,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1996-05-22","keywords":"train,betrayal,ethan hunt character,murder,based on tv show","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mission: Impossible","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3226468377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI2NjUyYjEtNzhiMy00ZGM4LTliNWQtM2ZkYjgwMGVmYjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI2NjUyYjEtNzhiMy00ZGM4LTliNWQtM2ZkYjgwMGVmYjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000685/","name":"Jon Voight"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000322/","name":"Emmanuelle Béart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000361/","name":"Brian De Palma"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312367/","name":"Bruce Geller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001873/","name":"Steven Zaillian"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
Mission: Impossible 2
Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc:
Mission: Impossible II: Directed by John Woo. With Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandiwe Newton, Ving Rhames. IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120755/","name":"Mission: Impossible II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RkYWVkZDQtNTMxMi00NWQ4LWE2ODctNmQzOWM2NjQzYzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUzOTY1NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120755/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"60 Percent Good, But Last 40 Ruined It","reviewBody":"The first 60 percent of this movie was pretty good; the last 40 percent was mostly action and mostly so hokey, so stupid, it was an insult for any viewer with a brain. Too bad, the first Mission Impossible was excellent and I hear the third film was good. However, this second one was a stinker by comparison.

I except most films to have that "Rambo mentality," as I call it, where hundreds of bullets are fired - and missed- at the hero, while he or she hits everything in sight. That was here but so overly done that is was absurd and downright annoying after awhile.

Tom Cruise, our hero, should have been shot so many times I lost count. This is director John Woo, for you, who always overdoes action and sometimes makes it ridiculous.

The good points are slick photography, interesting characters, good surround sound, low profanity and a very good soundtrack. Thandie Newton is attractive heroine and Dougray Scott is satisfactory as the main villain.

The movie plays more like a James Bond film, although it still has MI touches such as the fake rubber masks we saw in the first film. More realism in that 40 minutes would have made this a far better film than it turned out to be. Oveall, a bit disappointing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":325736,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2000-05-24","keywords":"finger cut off,ethan hunt character,luther stickell character,time bomb,slit skirt","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0779084/","name":"Dougray Scott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0628601/","name":"Thandiwe Newton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000247/","name":"John Woo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0194528/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312367/","name":"Bruce Geller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jack Reacher
Jack Reacher: Jednym strzałem
Jack Reacher
programme.desc: Jack Reacher: Directed by Christopher McQuarrie. With Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Richard Jenkins, David Oyelowo. A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0790724/","name":"Jack Reacher","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1NjUxMDI3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg1ODM3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0790724/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EmmaDinkins"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Chix Chat on Film Review: Reacher is the Man!","reviewBody":"Jack Reacher (Tom Cruise) is the tale of a very astute ex-military policeman. The army training came in quite handy as he digs into the evidence of a heinous crime that turns out to be not at all what it seems to be on the surface. I was surprised at how funny the dialogue in this film was, it is definitely not a comedy, but the sarcastic and comedic one-liners kept coming, even in situations that were completely devoid of a humorous setting there was some very amusing conversation. There was even a scene in which Reacher is attacked in a bathroom that had me cracking up at the bumbling bad guys. The comedy was heightened even further with the old codger Cash (Robert Duvall). Mr. Duvall always delivers a convincing performance, same here. As with any film that features Mr. Cruise the expectation is that it will be fast paced and very entertaining, same here. The only thing missing was his trademark sprint to or after something or anything. I've just come to expect to see him running, really running but we are getting older. The trailer is the only kind that I like, the ones that do not give away the whole movie. It shows that Reacher is bad a$$ without playing out every aspect of the story. David Oyelowo (Emerson) is one to watch, he is building an impressive resume and it is easy to see why because whenever he portrays a character he is that character. When he played a pilot in Red Tails, I totally believed he could fly a plane. When he was the head of a company experimenting on Apes, I was again thoroughly convinced and I believed every aspect of his being a police detective. One of the best car chase scenes that I've seen lately was in this film. There were so many attributes of this film that I liked, including the sexual tension between Reacher and Helen Ronin (Rosamund Pike) that I will just sum it up by saying. Everything just seemed to be genuine and authentic, even though I know that the fights are staged they looked logistically correct, but Steven Segal did come to mind. I liked that the film had a legitimate beginning and end, even if there are subsequent Jack Reacher tales to follow, there was no gaping wide open door of a final scene leaving the audience wondering 'What's up with that?!?'. But I do hope there are sequels, at least one. I give it a green light","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":320689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-12-26","keywords":"pittsburgh pennsylvania,sniper,coma,quarry,heads knocked together","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1158194201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2NzA4NjU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4MzI2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2NzA4NjU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4MzI2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0420955/","name":"Richard Jenkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0769768/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676193/","name":"Lee Child"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
Bękarty wojny
Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Inglourious Basterds: Directed by Quentin Tarantino. With Brad Pitt, Mélanie Laurent, Christoph Waltz, Eli Roth. In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0361748/","name":"Inglourious Basterds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTJiNDEzOWYtMTVjOC00ZjlmLWE0NGMtZmE1OWVmZDQ2OWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0361748/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chandean-69762"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Inglorious Basterds 2009 Review","reviewBody":"Tarantino does it again. Although not my favorite Tanantino film, it's still really great! If you've seen any of his previous work you know exactly what to expect. Inglorious Basterds does some masterful buildup. It all builds up to that finale, which is satisfying and so worth the 2 hour wait. Within the two hours before the finale contains some of the best character building i've seen, with some great acting (as usual, Tarantino knows exactly who he wants) that just make the film come alive. That combined with some tense action and some extremely suspenseful moments keep you on your toes the entire time. There's even a lot of humor in this which I wasn't expecting!\n\nPersonally there are some points that I felt dragged, but I feel like this will be even better with a second watch, and make most of those moments feel more meaningful.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1330951,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2009-10-14","keywords":"revenge,world war two,nazi,brutality,nazi hunter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Inglourious Basterds: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3738173977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MzMzMTMyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzA3MTEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MzMzMTMyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzA3MTEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"International trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1208167/","name":"Diane Kruger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744834/","name":"Eli Roth"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150452/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"duration":"PT2H33M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0361748, Title: Inglourious Basterds, --- Description: Inglourious Basterds: Directed by Quentin Tarantino. With Brad Pitt, Mélanie Laurent, Christoph Waltz, Eli Roth. In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0361748/","name":"Inglourious Basterds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTJiNDEzOWYtMTVjOC00ZjlmLWE0NGMtZmE1OWVmZDQ2OWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0361748/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chandean-69762","dateCreated":"2021-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Inglorious Basterds 2009 Review","reviewBody":"Tarantino does it again. Although not my favorite Tanantino film, it's still really great! If you've seen any of his previous work you know exactly what to expect. Inglorious Basterds does some masterful buildup. It all builds up to that finale, which is satisfying and so worth the 2 hour wait. Within the two hours before the finale contains some of the best character building i've seen, with some great acting (as usual, Tarantino knows exactly who he wants) that just make the film come alive. That combined with some tense action and some extremely suspenseful moments keep you on your toes the entire time. There's even a lot of humor in this which I wasn't expecting!\n\nPersonally there are some points that I felt dragged, but I feel like this will be even better with a second watch, and make most of those moments feel more meaningful.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1330951,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2009-10-14","keywords":"revenge,world war two,nazi,brutality,nazi hunter","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Inglourious Basterds: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3738173977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MzMzMTMyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzA3MTEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MzMzMTMyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzA3MTEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"International trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1208167/","name":"Diane Kruger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744834/","name":"Eli Roth"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150452/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"],"duration":"PT2H33M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. programme.title: Furious 6
Szybcy i wściekli 6
Furious 6
programme.desc:
Furious 6: Directed by Justin Lin. With Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jordana Brewster. Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1905041/","name":"Furious 6","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NTg2NDQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc2NzQzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1905041/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaClown"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Builds Upon The Winning Blockbuster Formula Of Fast Five.","reviewBody":"The sixth instalment in The Fast and the Furious franchise, Fast & Furious 6 follows into the footsteps of its predecessor and continues the series' new-found mantra of departing from its original street racing theme to move further into the heist thriller sub-genre. And even if it's not as refreshing & impressive as Fast Five, it nonetheless succeeds as another thrilling, ridiculously entertaining & undeniably fun extravaganza.

The story of Fast & Furious 6 concerns Dominic Toretto & his crew, all of whom have retired to a comfortable life following the heist they pulled off in the previous chapter yet they still remain wanted fugitives in their homeland. But when Hobbs asks for their services to take down a skilled mercenary organisation in exchange for clearing their criminal records, Dom accepts the deal and reassembles his team to finish one last job.

Directed by Justin Lin, Fast & Furious 6 is his final stint with this franchise and he decides to go out on a high note by delivering a picture that's far too enjoyable to worry about the laws of physics being bent here on few occasions. The screenplay packs in an interesting plot filled with excellent use of humour but it isn't as tightly gripped as the last instalment and is a slight step down in comparison. But a few elements do get an upgrade.

The technical aspects follow the same formula that was applied in Fast Five and there isn't much to complain here for the set pieces look spectacularly detailed, the action sequences benefit a lot from its energetic camera-work, brilliant editing & more use of practical effects just like the last chapter although at times the action goes way too over-the-top yet not so exaggerated for most viewers to suspend disbelief. And the background score is fitting for the most part.

Coming to the performances, the entire main cast that was present in the last one reprises its role, Michelle Rodrigues also returns to join the gang and Luke Evans is the new addition who plays this chapter's antagonist. Vin Diesel & Paul Walker do their usual best as Toretto & O'Conner, Dwayne Johnson continues to impress as Hobbs, However, Evans doesn't get enough screen time to show his mettle and his characters turns out to be a generic villain. The rest of the cast chips in with fine contributions.

On an overall scale, Fast & Furious 6 builds upon the very ingredients that worked in favour of Fast Five and, barring a couple of issues, manages to stay on the track for the most part. Although not as amazing as the previous entry, this is nevertheless an immensely enjoyable blockbuster material that promises a lot of fun & thrills, and effectively delivers it. Definitely more style than substance although the margin isn't as vast as it had been in the first four chapters of this franchise, Fast & Furious 6 comes delightfully recommended."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":381081,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-05-22","keywords":"canary islands,reference to spain,reference to the incredible hulk,humvee,brian o'conner character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3225003545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":" Agent Hobbs enlists the aid of Dom and team to help bring a rival gang, led by Owen Shaw, to justice. In exchange for clear records, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510912/","name":"Justin Lin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604555/","name":"Chris Morgan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860155/","name":"Gary Scott Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I.
