programme.title: Ex Machina
Ex Machina
programme.desc:
Ex Machina: Directed by Alex Garland. With Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander, Oscar Isaac, Sonoya Mizuno. A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0470752/","name":"Ex Machina","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNzc0OTIxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI3NzU2NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0470752/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"j-pollacchi"},"dateCreated":"2015-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good balance between sci-fi and psychology","reviewBody":"A great story, with complex yet very relatable characters. 

AI has been a recurring theme in sci-fi movies for some time now with varying degrees of plot and execution quality. I feel this movie aces both.

A secluded environment and very good original music set the mood for full focus on story and character development. The plot twists time and time again as an intelligence power-play is delivered with very good performances by this little known cast. Character development feels perfect as each one gains depth without loosing essence.

From a sci-fi point of view, it's not you're typical FX based movie, nor is it an action film. Nevertheless some very good effects and acting make for an excellent merge between fact and fiction that lets you concentrate on the philosophical questions the movie asks about the nature of AI. 

Conclusion: I'd recommend this film to anyone. Though warning it concentrates on the brain rather than the muscle. Excellent movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":502356,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-01-21","keywords":"artificial intelligence,turing test,minimal cast,robot human relationship,robot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi744337689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMjQzNzk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE4NjM0NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMjQzNzk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE4NjM0NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young programmer is selected to participate in a breakthrough experiment in artificial intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breathtaking female A.I.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1727304/","name":"Domhnall Gleeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1209966/","name":"Oscar Isaac"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390816/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

King Kong
programme.desc: King Kong: Directed by Peter Jackson. With Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann. A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0360717/","name":"King Kong","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYxYmRlZWYtMzAwNC00MDA1LWJjNTItOTBjMzlhNGMzYzk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0360717/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ripcords"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Terrific Adaptation","reviewBody":"This is the best adaptation to date of King Kong. It's a lengthy and rewarding piece. The over three hour run time might seem standoffish at first but you won't regret investing the time in watching this movie. The star of the film, Kong, is wonderfully anthropomorphic and you can readily identify with his nonverbal communication thanks to the work of Andy Serkis. A great and satisfying film. I am always saddened at the tragic ending.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":407251,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-01-25","keywords":"gorilla,king kong,island,barefoot woman,new york city","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4100440345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E5YjhlYzgtZWY2Yy00NDYwLTgyMjUtODI4ZDBmNTkzNWVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E5YjhlYzgtZWY2Yy00NDYwLTgyMjUtODI4ZDBmNTkzNWVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915208/","name":"Naomi Watts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085312/","name":"Jack Black"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004778/","name":"Adrien Brody"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001392/","name":"Peter Jackson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046203/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135516/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909638/","name":"Fran Walsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0101991/","name":"Philippa Boyens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001392/","name":"Peter Jackson"}],"duration":"PT3H7M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Starship Troopers 2: Held der Föderation
programme.desc: Die Enterprise erreicht Deneb IV und die Station Farpoint, die das Volk der Bandi der Föderation als Basis anbietet. Als unvermittelt ein außerirdisches Schiff auftaucht und die Stadt der Bandi beschießt, zeigt sich, dass die ganze Station eigentlich ein außerirdisches Lebewesen ist, welches verletzt auf dem Planeten gelandet war und von den Bewohnern versklavt wurde. Bei dem Angreifer handelt es sich um ein weiteres extraterrestrisches Wesen, das seinen Freund retten will. Als wäre dies noch nicht genug, erscheint plötzlich auch noch Q (John de Lancie) auf Deneb IV.

programme.title: Nie lubie poniedzialku
Nie lubię poniedziałku
programme.desc:
Nie lubie poniedzialku: Directed by Tadeusz Chmielewski. With Kazimierz Witkiewicz, Zygmunt Apostol, Bogusz Bilewski, Mieczyslaw Czechowicz. An acute case of Mondayitis in Warsaw. Interwoven stories of a few inhabitants of Warsaw, including one very unlucky Italian on a governmental mission and a charitable Polish American." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0067484/","name":"Nie lubie poniedzialku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NjkzNDQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjc0MjkwMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An acute case of Mondayitis in Warsaw. Interwoven stories of a few inhabitants of Warsaw, including one very unlucky Italian on a governmental mission and a charitable Polish American.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0067484/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"patryk-czekaj"},"dateCreated":"2012-05-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"A laughable take on Polish society in the Communist era","reviewBody":"Nie lubie poniedzialku is a great satire on the Polish reality during the period of harsh Communism. Tadeusz Chmielewski, similarly to another famous comedy director Stanisław Bareja, wanted to present the society and all of its problems in a really exaggerated way. 

What may be surprising to some of the viewers is the fact, that even though the movie presents a caricature of the country's situation, there are still some scenes and incidents that could have as well taken place in the 70's.

The movie takes on a truly irreverent tone, as it shows all of the occurring characters as people that may seem totally out of context. Yet, their peculiar behavior beautifully intertwines with the main storyline.

All the events in this film occur on one unlucky Monday. As the title says: 'I hate Mondays'. Because who doesn't? Everything bad always happens at the beginning of the week and it is better to stay at home and wait for the next day, just to avoid any misfortunes.

Here we find an Italian, who through a complex (and really funny) series of events is mistakenly taken for a totally different person. The most amazing fact is that nobody even noticed the he can only speak Italian. However, due to magnificent Polish hospitality he finds himself right in the middle of a big ceremony. And if this wasn't enough, he is also dragged into an affair with a pretty Polish lady.

In order to be able to fully understand all the dialogues, comical situations, and many, sometimes very odd, accidents one has to know even a bit about the history of Poland in the post-war era. It is almost impossible to translate the conversations to English language (or any other) without losing their contextual meaning. 

However, if you still want to experience a bit of Polish reality in those very hard times, but experience it with dozens of laughs, be sure to watch Nie lubie poniedzialku. It's definitely one of the best comedies that the country has to offer.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1912,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1971-08-27","keywords":"comedy of errors,farce,september,bad day,warsaw poland","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0936789/","name":"Kazimierz Witkiewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1144804/","name":"Zygmunt Apostol"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082200/","name":"Bogusz Bilewski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0158582/","name":"Tadeusz Chmielewski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030738/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0158582/","name":"Tadeusz Chmielewski"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

With Kazimierz Witkiewicz, Zygmunt Apostol, Bogusz Bilewski, Mieczyslaw Czechowicz. An acute case of Mondayitis in Warsaw. Interwoven stories of a few inhabitants of Warsaw, including one very unlucky Italian on a governmental mission and a charitable Polish American." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0067484/","name":"Nie lubie poniedzialku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NjkzNDQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjc0MjkwMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An acute case of Mondayitis in Warsaw. Interwoven stories of a few inhabitants of Warsaw, including one very unlucky Italian on a governmental mission and a charitable Polish American.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0067484/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"patryk-czekaj","dateCreated":"2012-05-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"A laughable take on Polish society in the Communist era","reviewBody":"Nie lubie poniedzialku is a great satire on the Polish reality during the period of harsh Communism. Tadeusz Chmielewski, similarly to another famous comedy director Stanisław Bareja, wanted to present the society and all of its problems in a really exaggerated way. 

What may be surprising to some of the viewers is the fact, that even though the movie presents a caricature of the country's situation, there are still some scenes and incidents that could have as well taken place in the 70's.

The movie takes on a truly irreverent tone, as it shows all of the occurring characters as people that may seem totally out of context. Yet, their peculiar behavior beautifully intertwines with the main storyline.

All the events in this film occur on one unlucky Monday. As the title says: 'I hate Mondays'. Because who doesn't? Everything bad always happens at the beginning of the week and it is better to stay at home and wait for the next day, just to avoid any misfortunes.

Here we find an Italian, who through a complex (and really funny) series of events is mistakenly taken for a totally different person. The most amazing fact is that nobody even noticed the he can only speak Italian. However, due to magnificent Polish hospitality he finds himself right in the middle of a big ceremony. And if this wasn't enough, he is also dragged into an affair with a pretty Polish lady.

In order to be able to fully understand all the dialogues, comical situations, and many, sometimes very odd, accidents one has to know even a bit about the history of Poland in the post-war era. It is almost impossible to translate the conversations to English language (or any other) without losing their contextual meaning. 

However, if you still want to experience a bit of Polish reality in those very hard times, but experience it with dozens of laughs, be sure to watch Nie lubie poniedzialku. It's definitely one of the best comedies that the country has to offer.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1912,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1971-08-27","keywords":"comedy of errors,farce,september,bad day,warsaw poland","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0936789/","name":"Kazimierz Witkiewicz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1144804/","name":"Zygmunt Apostol","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082200/","name":"Bogusz Bilewski"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0158582/","name":"Tadeusz Chmielewski"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030738/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0158582/","name":"Tadeusz Chmielewski"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="
